mapper.select: select t1.*,t2.* from t_promotion_info t1 left join t_promotion_group t2 on t1.promotion_id = t2.id where t1.promotion_id = #{promotionId}

select b.group_condition groupCondition, b.min_success_num minSuccessNum, a.end_time endTime,c.`status` status, c.item_num itemNum,c.user_num userNum, a.promotion_id promotionId from t_promotion_info a,t_promotion_group b ,t_group_info c where b.id=a.rule_id and a.promotion_id=c.promotion_id and a.promotion_id=#{promotionId}
